VanillaUpgrades.dll.name: Vanilla Upgrades
VanillaUpgrades.dll.description: Improves the vanilla expierience by adding quality of life features
VanillaUpgrades.dll.author: NeptuneSky

ANAIS.dll.name: ANAIS
ANAIS.dll.description: Replaces the stock navigation system with a more elaborated one
ANAIS.dll.author: Altiar

Texturable.dll.name: Textureable
Texturable.dll.description: Makes more parts texturable like parachutes, docking ports and all of that
Texturable.dll.author: NeptuneSky

AeroTrajectory.dll.name: Aero Trajectory
AeroTrajectory.dll.description: Shows you the trajectory you will have in an atmosphere
AeroTrajectory.dll.author: AstroTheRabbit

PartEditor.dll.name: Part Editor
PartEditor.dll.description: It is bp editing in game
PartEditor.dll.author: Cucumber Space

ThrustAssistMod.dll.name: Thrust Assist
ThrustAssistMod.dll.description: It helps you land and land at a target
ThrustAssistMod.dll.author: Darthan

ActionGroupsMod.dll.name: Action Groups Mod
ActionGroupsMod.dll.description: Adds KSP like Action Groups to SFS
ActionGroupsMod.dll.author: AstroTheRabbit

CustomSaveData.dll.name: Custom Save Data
CustomSaveData.dll.description: A Mod that allows for the saving and loading of custom modded data to rockets and blueprints
CustomSaveData.dll.author: AstroTheRabbit

SmartSASMod.dll.name: Smart SAS
SmartSASMod.dll.description: Adds Smart SAS that is able to lock onto Prograde, Retrograde, Surface and Target Nodes
SmartSASMod.dll.author: AstroTheRabbit

InfoOverload.dll.name: Info Overload
InfoOverload.dll.description: Shows you alot of information about whats going on in your world
InfoOverload.dll.author: Fusion Space Industries

Hyperwarp.dll.name: Hyperwarp
Hyperwarp.dll.description: Lets you go up to 1000x Physics Timewarp
Hyperwarp.dll.author: Starsubject

RandomFailuresLegacy.dll.name: Random Failures Legacy
RandomFailuresLegacy.dll.description: Adds a random small chance of an engine failing to ignite, or having an in-flight failure.
RandomFailuresLegacy.dll.author: TheAlgorithm476

ColoredOrbits.dll.name: Colored Orbits
ColoredOrbits.dll.author: Altiar
ColoredOrbits.dll.description: Makes the orbits colored so you could see them better

MultiLaunchpadMod.dll.name: Alternate Space Center support for custom solar systems
MultiLaunchpadMod.dll.author: Darthan
MultiLaunchpadMod.dll.description: Allows for multiple space centers in a custom solar system

ColorResBar.dll.name: Colour Resources Bar
ColorResBar.dll.author: SFSGamer-bili
ColorResBar.dll.description: Adds colour to the resource bars in game

RichPresenceSFS.dll.name: Discord Rich Presence
RichPresenceSFS.dll.author: N204
RichPresenceSFS.dll.description: Adds Discord rich presence to SFS

ALPACA.dll.name: ALPACA - Mod Installer
ALPACA.dll.author: Starsubject
ALPACA.dll.description: It is a in-game mod installer for SFSMI

BlueprintImage.dll.name: Blueprint Image
BlueprintImage.dll.author: SFSGamer-bili
BlueprintImage.dll.description: Allows you to export blueprints as images

Translation.dll.name: Translation Mod
Translation.dll.author: SFSGamer-bili
Translation.dll.description: Allows you to use translations in SFS PC

BurnEditor.dll.name: Burn Editor
BurnEditor.dll.author: SFSGamer-bili
BurnEditor.dll.description: Adds real time burn editing in SFS

SFSControl.dll.name: SFS APIs
SFSControl.dll.author: SFSGamer-bili
SFSControl.dll.description: This mod adds an API to Spaceflight Simulator (SFS) that can be called by external scripts or programs.

Enhanced.settings.dll.name: Enchanced Settings
Enhanced.settings.dll.author: SFSGamer-bili
Enhanced.settings.dll.description: A simple mod that extends SFS's settings

GlidingHeatShields.dll.name: Gliding Heat Shields
GlidingHeatShields.dll.author: Altiar
GlidingHeatShields.dll.description: Gives heat shields some lift capability

CustomMusic.dll.name: Custom Music
CustomMusic.dll.author: NeptuneSky
CustomMusic.dll.description: A mod that allows loading of custom music into Spaceflight Simulator.

BuildGridUtils.dll.name: Build Screen Utilities
BuildGridUtils.dll.author: NeptuneSky
BuildGridUtils.dll.description: This mod provides a simple options menu to change the build screen's grid, such as hiding the grid texture, changing the background color, and changing the size.

Warpinator.dll.name: Warpinator
Warpinator.dll.author: NeptuneSky
Warpinator.dll.description: An upgraded teleporter mod for Spaceflight Simulator.

BuildSettings.dll.name: SFS Build Settings
BuildSettings.dll.author: NeptuneSky
BuildSettings.dll.description: Adds Build settings to SFS such as snap to grid

SFSZoomKeys.dll.name: SFS Zoom Keys
SFSZoomKeys.dll.author: NeptuneSky
SFSZoomKeys.dll.description: This simple mod adds bindable zoom keys to Spaceflight Simulator. For trackpad users or people who otherwise can't zoom with a scroll wheel. Use Equals/Minus keys to zoom in and out, and use the Zero key to change the zoom speed.

PartText.dll.name: Part Text
PartText.dll.author: AstroTheRabbit
PartText.dll.description: A mod for the game Spaceflight Simulator that enables the editing of a part's JSON data, as well as some QoL settings

ForcefulFuelTanks.dll.name: Forceful Fuel Tanks
ForcefulFuelTanks.dll.author: AstroTheRabbit
ForcefulFuelTanks.dll.description: A mod for the game Spaceflight Simulator that applies an explosive force on parts in the radius of destroyed fuel tanks.

Object.Search.dll.name: Object Search Mod
Object.Search.dll.author: IDOMDOTCOM
Object.Search.dll.description: Allows the ability to search for objects (planets only at this point) and focus on them.

ImageCoverMod.dll.name: Image Cover Mod
ImageCoverMod.dll.author: AstarLC
ImageCoverMod.dll.description: A mod to load image into build scene.

FrameRateLockMod.dll.name: Frame Rate Lock Mod
FrameRateLockMod.dll.author: DarkSpace
FrameRateLockMod.dll.description: A lightweight mod that locks the game's frame rate and synchronizes physics timestep for consistent performance.

ConsoleMOD.dll.name: More Commands in Console
ConsoleMOD.dll.author: DarkSpace
ConsoleMOD.dll.description: ConsoleMOD is a utility mod for the SpaceFlight Simulator game that enhances the in-game console with additional commands for debugging and inspecting your rockets.

Teleporter.dll.name: Teleporter Mod
Teleporter.dll.author: N204
Teleporter.dll.description: Rocket teleporter mod for SFS by Osmo, ported to new ModLoader by N2O4.

UpsideDown2025.dll.name: Spaceflight Simulator: Australia Edition (APRIL FOOLS 2025)
UpsideDown2025.dll.author: N204
UpsideDown2025.dll.description: Finally. After 3 long years since its release on Steam (and 7 years after first release on mobile!), SFS is actually playable in Australia. All thanks to this great mod that I put together in a total of 2 hours.
